errors.BLOCK_SUBTITLE: We had trouble processing your request.
errors.GENERAL_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.NETWORK_ERROR: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.CANNOT_BAN_YOURSELF: You cannot ban your own account.
errors.CANNOT_LOCK_YOURSELF: You cannot block your own account.
errors.CANNOT_DELETE_YOURSELF: You cannot delete your own account.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: The account has been disabled. Please contact your administrator for account assistance.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED_FAILED_ATTEMPTS: Your account is temporarily locked due to entering the wrong password more than 5 times. Please contact the administrator for account support.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED_SUSPICIOUS: Your account is temporarily locked due to unusual signs. Please contact the administrator for account support.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED_ADMIN: The account has been disabled. Please contact the administrator for account support.
errors.TOKEN_EXPIRED: The session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN: The refresh token is invalid. Please log in again.
errors.REFRESH_EXPIRED_OR_REVOKED: The session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED_OR_INACTIVE: The account is locked or disabled. The forgot password function cannot be used.
errors.PASSWORD_NOT_APPLICABLE: The OAuth/Passkey login account does not have a password to reset.
errors.REQUEST_EXPIRED_OR_USED: The reset request has expired/used. Please get a new code.
errors.NOT_FOUND_OR_RATE_LIMITED: The user with the provided username or email has not been found, or the request limit has been exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_OTP: The OTP code is invalid. Please try again.
errors.OTP_EXPIRED: The code OTP has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD: The new password is too weak. Please choose another password.
errors.PASSWORD_SAME_AS_OLD: The new password cannot be the same as the old password.
errors.DELETE_LAST_ADMIN: Cannot delete the last user with the administrator role.
errors.ROLE_PRIVILEGE_REQUIRED: Select at least one permission to create a role.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED_OR_DISABLED: The account has been locked or disabled.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: The account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts.
errors.RATE_LIMITED: Login is temporarily limited due to unusual activity or spam. Please try again later.
errors.SESSION_EXPIRED: Session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.PASSWORD_SIZE: Password must be between 8 and 128 characters.
errors.FULL_NAME_SIZE: Full name must be between 4 and 128 characters.
errors.FULL_NAME_PATTERN: Full name can only contain letters and spaces.
errors.PHONE_INVALID: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits.
errors.DATE_OF_BIRTH_PAST: Date of birth must be in the past.
errors.IDENTITY_INVALID: Citizen ID/Passport must be exactly 12 digits.
errors.USER_MISSING_EMAIL: The user does not have an email address.
errors.not_found_or_rate_limited: The user with the provided username or email has not been found, or the request limit has been exceeded. Please try again later.

auth.forgot_otp_sent: If the account exists, the OTP has been sent.
auth.forgot_otp_verified: Valid OTP. Please enter a new password.

common.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?

admin.user_management_subtitle: Manage and monitor all users in the system

admin.confirm_lock_message: Are you sure you want to lock account "{{name}}"?
admin.confirm_unlock_message: Are you sure you want to unlock account "{{name}}"?
admin.confirm_disable_message: Are you sure you want to disable account "{{name}}"? The user will not be able to log in to the system.
admin.confirm_activate_message: Are you sure you want to activate account "{{name}}"?
admin.export_excel_info: Excel export feature is under development
admin.create_user_subtitle: Create new account and send welcome email automatically
admin.validation_fullname_min: Full name must be at least 2 characters
